name: An emotional hike
description:
Submission to the GMTK Jam 2020 by Razoric and HeadphoneUser.

Theme: Out of control, with the twist being that the character on the screen... is not one you control. You are merely his guide, and how he moves and what he is willing or not willing to do is governed by his emotions.

Left and right arrow keys to instruct the hiker to turn around. Up to instruct him to climb up ladders and down to instruct him to climb down ladders.
